item.title: Geri add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "One of the deep secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Geri add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Geri add a quote by Gustave Flaubert
item.description: "Human speech is like a cracked kettle on which we tap crude rhythms for bears to dance to, while we long to make music that will melt the stars." -- Gustave Flaubert

item.title: Geri add a quote by Katharine Graham
item.description: "The longer I live, the more I observe that carrying around anger is the most debilitating to the person who bears it." -- Katharine Graham

item.title: Geri add a quote by Will Shortz
item.description: "As human beings, we have a natural compulsion to fill empty spaces." -- Will Shortz

item.title: Geri add a quote by Ursula K. Le Guin
item.description: "Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone, it has to be made, like bread; remade all the time, made new." -- Ursula K. Le Guin

item.title: Geri add a quote by Patti Smith
item.description: "No one expected me. Everything awaited me." -- Patti Smith

item.title: Geri add a quote by Colette
item.description: "I went to collect the few personal belongings which...I held to be invaluable: my cat, my resolve to travel, and my solitude." -- Colette

item.title: Geri add a quote by Don Carpenter
item.description: "I consider my work optimistic in that the people, during the period Iâ€™m writing about them, are experiencing intense emotion. It is my belief that this is all there is to it." -- Don Carpenter

item.title: Geri add a quote by Alfred Tennyson
item.description: "I will drink life to the lees." -- Alfred Tennyson

item.title: Geri add a quote by Annie Dillard
item.description: "One of the few things I know about writing is this: spend it all, shoot it, play it, lose it, all, right away, every time...give it, give it all, give it now." -- Annie Dillard

item.title: Geri add a quote by Colleen McCullough
item.description: "Never forget, Caelius, that a great man makes his luck. Luck is there for everyone to seize. Most of us miss our chances; we're blind to our luck. He never misses a chance because he's never blind to the opportunity of the moment." -- Colleen McCullough

item.title: Geri add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Great minds are always feared by lesser minds." -- Dan Brown
